name: Sexy Serial Killer
description:
Your lonely dad has not dated for 3 years. You convince him to try a computer dating service. Unfortunately for him his date is actually a serial killer. Can you save your dad and escape with your life?



Features:

Atmospheric Environments - An eerie immersive and detail world is waiting for you to explore.
Psychological Experience - Sexy Serial Killer has been designed to provide a psychological horror experience.
Game-play - Intuitive mechanics and controls.
Enemies - The killer will hinder your advance at almost every turn. You are the hunted, not the hunter.
Puzzle Elements - Collect and harness items to aid your survival and progression..
Audio - Features intense and immersive music and sounds.
Random Encounters - Enemy can spawn dynamically and can be located anywhere. Nowhere is safe.
Story - Sexy Serial Killer story is loosely based on real life events.
